sections.description: htmx extends and generalizes the core idea of HTML as a hypertext, opening up many more possibilities directly within the language:
sections.titleText: htmx is a library that allows you to access modern browser features directly from HTML, rather than using javascript

cards.title: HTTP Request
cards.description: Now any element, not just anchors and forms, can issue an HTTP request

cards.title: Trigger Requests
cards.description: Now any event, not just clicks or form submissions, can trigger requests

cards.title: HTTP Verbs
cards.description: Now any HTTP verb, not just GET and POST, can be used

cards.title: Any Element
cards.description: Now any element, not just the entire window, can be the target for update by the request
